Descriptor API
[Level 1 API]

Collaboration diagram for Descriptor API:

Detailed Description

This is the API interface used to fill and use Comedilib device descriptor structure


Functions

int comedi_open (comedi_desc_t *dsc, const char *fname)
 Open a Comedi device and basically fill the descriptor.
int comedi_close (comedi_desc_t *dsc)
 Close the Comedi device related with the descriptor.
int comedi_fill_desc (comedi_desc_t *dsc)
 Fill the descriptor with subdevices, channels and ranges data.
int comedi_get_subdinfo (comedi_desc_t *dsc, unsigned int subd, comedi_sbinfo_t **info)
 Get an information structure on a specified subdevice.
int comedi_get_chinfo (comedi_desc_t *dsc, unsigned int subd, unsigned int chan, comedi_chinfo_t **info)
 Get an information structure on a specified channel.
int comedi_get_rnginfo (comedi_desc_t *dsc, unsigned int subd, unsigned int chan, unsigned int rng, comedi_rnginfo_t **info)
 Get an information structure on a specified range.

Function Documentation

int comedi_close (  comedi_desc_t *  dsc  ) 
 

Close the Comedi device related with the descriptor.

Parameters:
[in] dsc Device descriptor
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise negative error code.

int comedi_fill_desc (  comedi_desc_t *  dsc  ) 
 

Fill the descriptor with subdevices, channels and ranges data.

Parameters:
[in] dsc Device descriptor partly filled by comedi_open().
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise negative error code.

int comedi_get_chinfo (  comedi_desc_t *  dsc,
unsigned int  subd,
unsigned int  chan,
comedi_chinfo_t **  info
) 
 

Get an information structure on a specified channel.

Parameters:
[in] dsc Device descriptor filled by comedi_open() and comedi_fill_desc()
[in] subd Subdevice index
[in] chan Channel index
[out] info Channel information structure
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise negative error code.

int comedi_get_rnginfo (  comedi_desc_t *  dsc,
unsigned int  subd,
unsigned int  chan,
unsigned int  rng,
comedi_rnginfo_t **  info
) 
 

Get an information structure on a specified range.

Parameters:
[in] dsc Device descriptor filled by comedi_open() and comedi_fill_desc()
[in] subd Subdevice index
[in] chan Channel index
[in] rng Range index
[out] info Range information structure
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise negative error code.

int comedi_get_subdinfo (  comedi_desc_t *  dsc,
unsigned int  subd,
comedi_sbinfo_t **  info
) 
 

Get an information structure on a specified subdevice.

Parameters:
[in] dsc Device descriptor filled by comedi_open() and comedi_fill_desc()
[in] subd Subdevice index
[out] info Subdevice information structure
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise negative error code.

int comedi_open (  comedi_desc_t *  dsc,
const char *  fname
) 
 

Open a Comedi device and basically fill the descriptor.

Parameters:
[out] dsc Device descriptor
[in] fname Device name
Returns:
0 on success, otherwise negative error code.
